owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._isLocal: Configures the locality of the ownership.
params._owner: The new owner of the contract.

isLocal().notice: If true, the contract uses the cross domain _checkOwner function override.         If false it uses the standard Ownable _checkOwner function.

transferOwnership(address,bool).notice: Allows for ownership to be transferred with specifying the locality.

isLocal().notice: If true, the contract uses the cross domain _checkOwner function override.         If false it uses the standard Ownable _checkOwner function.

transferOwnership(address,bool).notice: Allows for ownership to be transferred with specifying the locality.

OwnershipTransferred(address,address,boo.notice: Emits when ownership of the contract is transferred. Includes the         isLocal field in addition to the standard `Ownable` OwnershipTransferred event.

userdoc.notice: This contract extends the OpenZeppelin `Ownable` contract for L2 contracts to be owned         by contracts on either L1 or L2. Note that this contract is meant to be used with         systems that use the CrossDomainMessenger system. It will not work if the         OptimismPortal is used directly.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._isLocal: Configures the locality of the ownership.
params._owner: The new owner of the contract.

params.newOwner: The new owner of the contract.
params.previousOwner: The previous owner of the contract.

documentation.text:
@notice If true, the contract uses the cross domain _checkOwner function override.
         If false it uses the standard Ownable _checkOwner function.
